p: This is arguably good news for critical scholars promoting the politicization and democratization of adaptation (Mikulewicz 2018; Meerow and Mitchell 2017; Adger 2016). While explicit and specific demands for adaptation have not been particularly visible in the demands of FFF (which have largely been kept general for strategic reasons (de Moor, de Vydt, et al. 2020)), many activists appear to demonstrate a willingness to put adaptation central in the movement’s demands, suggesting they would support movement leaders choosing to steer in this direction.
